access_update.text: "{actor}" updated card with holder "{holder, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{holder}}}" (FID: "{fingerprint}") access, adding {newCount, plural, =1 {# device} other {# devices}} and removing {deleteCount, plural, =1 {# device} other {# devices}}.
access_update.title: Card access updated

activate.text: "{actor}" activated card with holder "{holder, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{holder}}}" (FID: "{fingerprint}").
activate.title: Card activated

create.text: "{actor}" created card with holder "{holder, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{holder}}}" (FID: "{fingerprint}").
create.title: Card created

deactivate.text: "{actor}" deactivated card with holder "{holder, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{holder}}}" (FID: "{fingerprint}").
deactivate.title: Card deactivated

delete.text: "{actor}" deleted card with holder "{holder, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{holder}}}" (FID: "{fingerprint}").
delete.title: Card deleted

lock.text: "{actor, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{actor}}}" locked device "{deviceName}" (SN: "{serialId}") using card with fingerprint "{fingerprint}".
lock.title: Card locked device

rename.text: "{actor}" renamed card holder to "{holder, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{holder}}}" (FID: "{fingerprint}").
rename.title: Card holder renamed

unlock.text: "{actor, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{actor}}}" unlocked device "{deviceName}" (SN: "{serialId}") using card with fingerprint "{fingerprint}".
unlock.title: Card unlocked device

access_denied.text: Someone tried to access device "{deviceName}" (SN: "{serialId}") using card with fingerprint "{fingerprint}" but it was denied.
access_denied.title: Device access denied

access_update.text: "{actor}" updated device "{deviceName}" (SN: "{serialId}") access, adding {newCount, plural, =1 {# card} other {# cards}} and removing {deleteCount, plural, =1 {# card} other {# cards}}.
access_update.title: Device access updated

add_card.text: "{actor}" added device to card with holder "{holder, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{holder}}}" (FID: "{fingerprint}").
add_card.title: Device added to card

emergency_state.text: "{actor}" updated device "{deviceName}" (SN: "{serialId}") emergency state to "{emergencyState, select, lockdown {LOCKDOWN} evacuation {EVACUATION} other {CLEAR}}".
emergency_state.title: Device emergency state updated

lock.text: "{actor, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{actor}}}" locked device "{deviceName}" (SN: "{serialId}") {isCard, select, true {using card with fingerprint "{fingerprint}"} other {using the dashboard}}.
lock.title: Device locked

re_lock_delay.text: "{actor}" updated device "{deviceName}" (SN: "{serialId}") re-lock delay to "{reLockDelay, select, 0 {never} other {{reLockDelay} {reLockDelay, plural, one {second} other {seconds}}}}".
re_lock_delay.title: Device re-lock delay updated

remove_card.text: "{actor}" removed device from card with holder "{holder, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{holder}}}" (FID: "{fingerprint}").
remove_card.title: Device removed from card

unlock.text: "{actor, select, NULL {(unknown)} other {{actor}}}" unlocked device "{deviceName}" (SN: "{serialId}") {isCard, select, true {using card with fingerprint "{fingerprint}"} other {using the dashboard}}.
unlock.title: Device unlocked

pending_adoption.text: "{actor}" set device in state pending adoption.
pending_adoption.title: Device pending adoption
